lead_paragraph: Former captain Shaun Pollock thinks Dale Steyn will be remembered as the best test bowler South Africa has produced even if he never gets back on to the pitch to claim the record as the country's most prolific wicket-taker.

headline.print_headline: Champagne on Ice, Steyn Faces Six Months on Sidelines
headline.main: Champagne on Ice, Steyn Faces Six Months on Sidelines

snippet: Former captain Shaun Pollock thinks Dale Steyn will be remembered as the best test bowler South Africa has produced even if he never gets back on to the pitch to claim the record as the country's most prolific wicket-taker....
